The faculty will implement a short semester in Semester 3, Session 2023/2024 spanning from 4 August until 3 October 2024. In connection with that, students who are interested in enrolling in this short semester are compulsory to fill in the Short Semester Course Registration Application Form.
answer: Please ensure all sections of the form are filled out accurately and submit it via the provided Google Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScsuok7hJV07BcijzRjIj3qwv09NcO41h3DjC0157sB5Ie2WQ/viewform) by no later than 13 June 2024. The faculty will only process forms that are fully completed. Contact No : 07-5557064, Email : skm-ug@utm.my
